title: [The Krawling Kraken]
description: The room is dominated by a huge marble statue to the west, set upon a raised platform of white washed stone.  Dark paneled walls reflect the moonlight cascading down from an open skylight in the high vaulted ceiling onto the base of the statue.  A thick burgundy drape cleverly conceals an alcove across from the statue and some long blue silk curtains offer passage to the south, back to the inn proper.

The room is dominated by a huge marble statue to the west, set upon a raised platform of white washed stone.  Dark paneled walls reflect the sunlight cascading down from an open skylight in the high vaulted ceiling onto the base of the statue.  A blue velvet drape cleverly conceals an alcove across from the statue and some long blue silk curtains offer passage to the south, back to the inn proper.
